name: @cap-js/cds-types
description: Type definitions for main packages of CAP, like `@sap/cds`
author: SAP SE (https://www.sap.com)

scripts.test:runtime: npx tsc test/typescript/runtime.test.ts --target ES2020 --module commonjs && node --test './test/typescript/runtime.test.js'; rm test/typescript/runtime.test.js
scripts.test:all: npm run test:runtime && npm run test:api-calls && npm run test:typings
scripts.test:setup: npm install file:. --no-save --force && npm run prerelease:ci-fix
scripts.test: npm run test:setup && npm run test:rollup-on
scripts.test:rollup-on: npm run rollup && npm run rollup:on && npm run test:all --silent
scripts.test:rollup-off: npm run rollup:off && npm run test:all --silent
scripts.rollup: rm -rf dist/ && mkdir -p etc/ && npx -y @microsoft/api-extractor run --local --verbose && .github/rollup-patch.js
scripts.rollup:on: npm pkg set typings=dist/cds-types.d.ts && [ -d 'apis' ] && mv -- apis -apis || true
scripts.rollup:off: npm pkg set typings=apis/cds.d.ts  && [ -d '-apis' ] && mv -- -apis apis || true
